Html:
This is a very very good project!

NetOffice.MSComctlLibApi.ImageList.ListImages.Add
Is there any one knew what is the right type object for the third parameter?
I tried to use this as the pic
object pic = Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.ImageToIPictureDisp(Image.FromFile(@"C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\Koala.jpg"));
it threw an exception for the Add method call.
How can we construct this parameter?

I will be appreciate your helps, thanks!

Mike
